column4: anyone  knows if it's possible to print on a windows network printer  from an ubuntu box?  Is there a way I can configure ubuntu so I can map the printer from a windows network to ubuntu?
I do not know the details, but this can be done with "SAMBA".
i can configure samba to to share resources on my linux box, yes but i am talking about a printer on a windows printer server, not on a samba server
I thought that when a person logs into the Windows network with SAMBA they then can use the networked printer???
